changes.title: Added a list of recent updates, accessed through the new "Updates" item in the toolbar.
Added an option to export data to Roam Research from the user page.
Fixed bug where adding a parent would collapse all items.
Added keyboard shortcut Alt+F for "Find" action.
Changed link UI so that links are now shown with a bullet next to them.
Made my task list publicly available here: https://thinktool.io/work.html
Changed bullets such that collapsed bullets are now rings, and expanded bullets are filled discs.
Made it possible to toggle whether or not the toolbar is shown.
Show a bullet graphic next to the note that is currently zoomed in, instead of highlighting it in bold.
Improve display of update list on devices with narrow screens.
Created a very basic prototype of an offline desktop client, currently just containing the demo.
Removed link to user page in demo.
Implemented saving and loading in desktop client.
Fixed a bug in the demo that would cause all items to show up as empty until clicked.
Fixed a bug where no items showed up, and making any changes would crash the app.
Fixed a bug where links would sometimes "eat" nearby characters at the beginning and end of items.
Improved appearance of landing page in Safari 13.0.
Fixed bug where you couldn't click on toolbar items on macOS.
Improved keyboard shortcuts on macOS.
Wrote a more in-depth tutorial for Thinktool here: https://thinktool.io/tutorial.html
Fixed crash when manually typing link to non-existent item and then editing that item's content.
Fixed a bug where any selected text would not be used correctly in the popup when adding a link, sibling, child or parent.
Add basic versoin of 'Pages' feature, which lets you mark important notes as pages. Currently, this just shows a border around the page.
Improved spacing and layout of pages in the outline.
Pages are now expanded by default. (Reverted 2020-07-17.)
Simplified bullet graphics, so they now only distinguish between expanded and collapsed states.
Improved selection popup appearance and UX. Selecting a match is now preferred to creating a new item by default.
Fixed bug causing an infinite loop when looking at a page that was its own ancestor.
Label 'Create new item' in item selection popup.
Fixed bug where bullet next to 'References' was too small.
Fixed behavior of external links in desktop client, so they now open in system browser.
Changed appearance of internal links to make them more obvious.
Changed behavior of opened internal links, so that toggling a link in the tree removes it instead of just collapsing it.
Added full support for pages to desktop client.
Changed appearance of internal links and pages.
Pages are no longer expanded automatically.
Changed appearance of selected (zoomed-in) item to make its behavior less surprising.
Made a short "slideshow" that introduces the core features of Thinktool when you first start the app.
Changed UI of references so that it's now a heading instead of a node in the outline.
Improved appearance of internal links that are long enough to cause line breaks.
Added indicator when hovering over bullet to make it more obvious that you can click on it.
Tweaked UI of opened links so the border is now only around the item itself, not its children
Added border to other parents to make them stand out more.
Made various changes to the typography of the app itself.
Made some minor improvements to the tutorial.
Improved appearance of other parents by using a different bullet graphic instead of border.
Also added special bullet graphic for references, to match parents.
Updated appearance of links to match new parents and references style.
Fixed appearance of links that would have a line break inserted between the bullet and the first word.
Various minor UI improvements, including toolbar, search popup and tutorial.
Added 'Home' action to the toolbar.
Improved appearance of top bar.
Removed pages again. I wasn't really able to do anything interesting with this feature.
Made it possible to middle click or shift click a link to jump to it.
Renamed 'Zoom' to 'Jump'.
Fixed bug where it was sometimes impossible to expand items that only had other parents but no children.
Added link to 'r/thinktool' subreddit to toolbar and mentioned it in tutorial.
Show other parents above items (instead of showing them as children).
Clicking on parents now jumps there by default, instead of expanding them below the item.
When pasting multiple paragraphs, each paragaph is now inserted as its own item.
(Desktop client:) Removed the unused menu bar.
Various under-the-hood improvements to the editor component.
Text cursor is now placed in the correct position after inserting a link.
Pressing Enter while editing an item now always inserts a new item. Items can no longer contain newlines.
Fixed bug where inserting a link as the only text in an empty item wouldn't do anything.
Fixed minor bug with the appearance of the search popup.
Content of links to other items is now shown even in the active editor.
Links to other items are now clickable in the active editor.
Improved consistency and apparance of links to other items in the active editor.
URLs are now clickable in the active editor.
Overhauled editor component. Now you no longer have to click on an item twice to focus it.
Fixed a visual bug with the 'New Item' placeholder item.
Fixed a bug that would cause newly inserted spaces at the end of an item to disappear when using Firefox.
Greatly improved search algorithm, which now supports fuzzy matches and relevance ranking.
Fixed crash that would happen when viewing some types of empty items.
Improved initial load performance for large databases.
Broken links to items that have been deleted are now shown explicitly.
It is now possible to middle click or shift-click item links to jump there.
Shift-clicking a bullet now also jumps there. (Previously, only middle clicking did this.)
Fixed issue where nodes with other parents would indicate that they could be toggled, even if they had no children or references.
Bullets of opened links inside items are now highlighted.
Fixed bug where it was impossible to remove a child that was its own parent.
Fixed a bug where the list of parents for the currently focused item would sometimes not be updated when inserting or removing it as a child of another item.
Fixed a bug where typing too fast (!) would cause a crash.
Fixed an issue where the icon would not be displayed inside the application itself.
When backspacing over an empty item, that item is now automatically destroyed.
Destroying an item (e.g. with Alt-Delete) now places the cursor in the previous item.
Added system to tutorial that gives you goals to accomplish.
Major code overhaul of integration of search popup, editor and toolbar.
Continued refactoring various component to allow for more automatic tests.
Fixed an issue where the changelog would not appear when clicking 'Updates', and improve the appearance of the changelog.
Made it possible to 'Remove' a parent from its child.
Fixed issue where icons would sometimes not show up until the page was reloaded.
Fixed an issue with URL updates that would cause the back button to be unable to navigate through history inside Thinktool.

Continuing overhauling various parts of the application, especially the editor component to make them more testable. This will hopefully reduce the number of bugs in the long term, but may introduce new bugs in the short term.
Fixed an issue where the text cursor would flicker when clicking inside an item.
Improved performance, especially for large outlines.
Continued working on performance improvements, especially around editing.
Added 'Unfold' button to toolbar. It recursively shows all children of the focused item. This is currently quite slow when there are lots of children.
Various minor optimizations to avoid unnecessary rerenders and speed up editing.
Added a button next to the currently focused item that unfolds all child items recursively.
Published new version with a large number of behind-the-scenes code changes. No new features, hopefully no new bugs either.
Added 'sticky' drag-and-drop behavior to avoid accidental drags when you meant to click on the bullet.
Tweaked UI to avoid horizontal shift when scrollbar appears.
Started working on an 'inbox' view that can be used to find all items that don't connect back to the root item.
Improved responsiveness of search popup, especially for long queries.
Search popup now shows links and parents of items.
General performance improvements, including more optimizations for search popup.
Fixed a bug where search popup would not be populated with results when opening it after selecting some text.
Fixed a bug with the behavior of the text cursor on items beginning with a link.
Tweaked appearance of internal links to make them stand out slightly more.
Fixed a bug where backwards text selection would not populate search popup.
You can now insert a connection to an existing item by first creating a new item, and then pressing Alt-X to replace that item with another one.
Added a 'search bar' that suggests an action based on the current context and reminds you of its shortcut.
Fixed an issue where editors would not register focus changes when the user clicked on an item in the same position that the cursor had before losing focus.
Pressing escape now unfocuses currently focused editor.
Replaced the old search popup with a popup under the new search bar.
The app now remembers whether the toolbar menu is shown or hidden.
Tweaked appearance of links between items (from yellow to blue and grey).
